## Introduction

First, the library is loaded:
```{r, message=FALSE}
library(bigmi)
```


```{r}
data(danedb)
db <- danedb
db[, "DYS389II"] <- db[, "DYS389II"] - db[, "DYS389I"]
```


```{r}
MI_categorical_all_pairwise(db)
```
